headline: Why Analysts Stay Bullish on ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW) Despite a 28% Slide
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is among the stocks with the best earnings growth for the next 5 years. On January 13, Brian Schwartz, an analyst at Oppenheimer, reaffirmed a ‘Buy’ rating on ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW). With a price target of $200, the stock has an upside potential of 68%.
